block.biomeswevegone.florus.stem_sapling:
A cactus-like wood type.
I'm not sure how to replant it...
block.biomeswevegone.maple_sapling.desc: A good tree, unfortunately named after a former friend.
block.biomeswevegone.red_maple_sapling.d: The tree name reminds me of Canada...
block.biomeswevegone.skyris.desc: A foreign type of tree found by that hare.
block.biomeswevegone.yellow_sakura_sapli: A type of tree that seems to be popular with anime watchers.
block.biomeswevegone.white_sakura_saplin: A type of tree that seems to be popular with anime watchers.
block.create.hand_crank.desc: A hand-turned crank to power my saw.
block.create.mechanical_saw.desc: A saw utility. Good for cutting down trees fast.
block.minecraft.allium.desc: A nice flower. Too bad I don't need it...
block.minecraft.birch_sapling.desc: A nice, white type of tree.
block.minecraft.cactus.desc: That kind of hurts, but it gets me green dye.
block.minecraft.calcite.desc: I know a gnome friend who likes these.
block.minecraft.cherry_sapling.desc: A type of tree commonly used by weebs.
block.minecraft.dark_oak_sapling.desc: I know a gnome friend who likes this kind of tree.
block.minecraft.dandelion.desc: A nice flower. Too bad I don't need it...
block.minecraft.dirt.desc:
An essential building block for farming.
Need to find me a lot of these...
block.minecraft.green_banner.desc: The color is almost after my favorite color...
block.minecraft.kelp.desc: I almost wish I could smoke this.
block.minecraft.oak_sapling.desc: An oak tree. The easiest type to farm.
block.minecraft.obsidian.desc: An element for nether portals. Really hard to break...
block.minecraft.player_head.desc: The disembodied head of a player.
block.minecraft.powder_snow.desc: A terrible block that inflicts entrapment and cruel cold.
block.minecraft.sand.desc: The hare can give me dirt if I get her this.
block.minecraft.spruce_sapling.desc: A spruce tree. An easy type to come across.
block.minecraft.sugar_cane.desc:
A good item for making Paper.
How do I farm this again?
block.minecraft.torch.desc: A simple utility that brings light.
block.minecraft.tnt.desc: A simple bomb. Are these Taph's?
item.minecraft.apple.desc: A healthy snack while you work!
item.minecraft.bone.desc:
A good treat for a good boy.
When crushed up, it makes a good fertilizer.
item.minecraft.bone_meal.desc: An amazing fertilizer for grass and trees.
item.minecraft.diamond.desc: A solid ore for making tools.
item.minecraft.diamond_axe.desc: Whiteclaw wants another victim. And mending.
item.minecraft.diamond_pickaxe.desc:
A good utility for mining Obsidian.
I should get Mending before I main one of these...
item.minecraft.diamond_shovel.desc: A tool for the long haul.
item.minecraft.dried_kelp.desc:
A sea-based item for eating.
Kind of stale and hard to eat...
item.minecraft.ender_pearl.desc: I can throw these on my own, why do I need these?
item.minecraft.iron_ingot.desc:
A disposable ore for throwaway tools.
Also good for making blocks!
item.minecraft.milk_bucket.desc: A simple drink to take off the buzz.
item.minecraft.water_bucket.desc: A good MLG trick. But touching water hurts...
item.minecraft.wheat_seeds.desc: I used to throw these away. I still do.
item.aether.blue_berry.desc: A nice snack. It seems to come from another universe...
item.aether.zanite_ore.desc: Amazing gems that speed up as they wear down.
item.aether.zanite_shovel.desc: A fast shovel, but by the time you noticed its speed, it's too late.
item.aether.gravitite_shovel.desc:
A very efficient mining tool.
Makes dirt, gravel and sand go bye bye if you right click!
item.farmersdelight.onion.desc:
An alright snack.
I should bake with these instead of eating them raw...
item.origins.orb_of_origin.desc: A shiny orb that lets you change your family lineage.
